turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Grižane-Belgrad.
turn.2: Grižane-Belgrad  Grižane-Belgrad is a village in Primorje-Gorski Kotar County of Croatia.
turn.4: It is located near Crikvenica and Novi Vinodolski.
turn.6: It has a population of 953 (census 2011) and the post code HR-51244.
turn.7: What is the difference between the two?
turn.8: The modern-day settlement includes the former villages Grižane and Belgrad, and numerous nearby hamlets.
turn.9: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.10: The Grižane Castle overlooks the village.
